title: Intelligence Agency Data Archive — Subject: North
content:
[[include info:start]]
**Author:** [[*user Doctor North]]. 

**Note:** This is not a 404 error....click the red link at the bottom of the page...it’s a collapsible. If you thought it was a real 404 error. Please let me know in the discussion thread

%%title%%: Please remain seated or enter security access code. 
[[/module]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Personel information]]


**Name:** Doctor Karlos North

**Security Clearance:** X Where X is 1 ≤ X ≤ 5

**Decoy Assignment:** Level 2 Junior Researcher.

**Actual Assignment:** Intelligence Agency — Espionage and Logistics division. 

**Current Location:** [[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-site-11 | Site-11]]]
----
**Profile:** Doctor Karlos North; Your regular coffee addict and quiet individual that probably wants nothing to do with real-world problems and rather curl up on a soft couch playing Pokemon Emerald on a Gameboy Advance SP till the batteries die.
[[include component:image-block
    name=DoctorNorth3|
    caption=Doctor North|
    width=220px
]]
Armed with training in hand to hand combat as well as proficiency in marksman training. Doctor Karlos North started off in the sniper field of the Intelligence Agency’s recon division. 

After a few years behind the scope of a rifle. Doctor Karlos North switched from the recon division and moved over to the Espionage and Logistics division.

Doctor Karlos North currently works within the Intelligence Agency as a field agent often infiltrating Groups of Interest as a double agent and keeping up to date with other agents that have already infiltrated important GoIs.

**Known alias:** Ariwa, Norden, Veri, Norte, Şimol, Nord, Leboea.

----
**Pre-Foundation History:** Karlos North was once a student at Michigan Technological University as a grad student on the path to a PhD in physics and chemistry. North before attending MTU had nearly passed basic training for the USMC at Parris Island before being dishonorably discharged due to lying about their medical history. 

Before North could fully finish their PhD at MTU. They were expelled from the University for supposably tampering with another student's research as well as theft. However, without any actual evidence to the crime, no criminal charges were pressed.  
[[footnoteblock]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab SCP Articles]]
What kind of Author doesn't have an SCP articles to their name? Well this one apprently.

I'll most likely make an SCP article some time later. Maybe. More than likely. Count on it. It will happen someday. I promise. One of these days. Maybe soon. In a bit. Another day. Blurb.
[[/tab]]
